name: Swapette Showdown
description:
Swapette Showdown is a love letter to classic action competitive puzzler games.
Join the Swapettes in their battle to become the champion! Play the game with many different modes and characters. Each mode features a different way to play. Each character has their own unique abilities. Play online and climb the ranks.KEY FEATURES
  • Story Mode: Uncover the story of the game and your favorite characters.
  • VS Mode: Play with up to 4 players or CPUs with various goals
  • Classic Mode: Play on even grounds with no specials and abilities
  • Endless Mode: Try to get the highest score and see how long you can last
  • Puzzle Mode: Solve specific challenges with set amount of moves
  • Online Play: Climb the ranks and challenge other players from all over
  • Special Abilities: As you match blocks, gain the ability to unleash powerful attacks
  • Many Characters: Each with their own specials
